assertions.assertion: The sched_getparam() function shall return the scheduling parameters of a process specified by pid in the sched_param structure pointed to by param.
When pid = 0, the scheduling parameters are returned for the calling process
sched_getparam() sets errno == ESRCH if the pid cannot be found
sched_getparam() sets errno == EPERM if the requesting process does not have permission
sched_getparam() sets errno == EFAULT or EINVAL if param points to NULL
